description.displayText: Caroline is an excellent babysitter, takes care of babies with a lot of love and affection and has a lot of technique to give you with the issues of newborns.  I really recommend her, it will make a difference in your family's lives and you can rest easy knowing that your baby is being taken care of very well. I really loved the Caroline job.
description.originalText: Caroline is an excellent babysitter, takes care of babies with a lot of love and affection and has a lot of technique to give you with the issues of newborns.  I really recommend her, it will make a difference in your family's lives and you can rest easy knowing that your baby is being taken care of very well. I really loved the Caroline job.

description.displayText: Carol is a loving, sweet girl that always watched out on my daughter needs. Always happy and in a good mood to play and help. An amazing person that will be there for anything you need. I highly recommend her wonderful job!
description.originalText: Carol is a loving, sweet girl that always watched out on my daughter needs. Always happy and in a good mood to play and help. An amazing person that will be there for anything you need. I highly recommend her wonderful job!

description.displayText:
Caroline worked for 2 years taking care of my daughter. When she started my daughter was 6 months old and she stayed with us for 2 years until the end of 2020. Honestly we never had any problems with her she is just amazing. 
She took very good care of my daughter, was very sweet, affectionate and taught her a few words in Portuguese.  
Caroline interacted very well, sat on the floor to play, made arts and craft, blocks and read her books.  
The reason she didn't stay with us is that I moved and honestly it wasn't worth the commute. I understood, it would be too expensive and stressful for her.
She always helped me with the laundry for the baby, the kitchen was always clean after my daughter ate, before leaving she always put toys away. I confess that I have no complaints about her, if it wasn't so far I would love Caroline to have stayed with us for a long time.
